verses.verse: Therefore, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and Tubal: <S%H8422><s%>

And I will turn thee <S%H7725>back,<s%> and leave but the sixth <S%H8338>part<s%> of thee, and will cause thee to come <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>parts,<s%> <S%H3411><s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> out of thy <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and will cause thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H102>bands,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> thee: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee unto the <S%H5861>ravenous<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>sort,<s%> and to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> to be <S%H402>devoured.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> and among them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>carelessly<s%> in the <S%H339>isles:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So will I <S%H3045>make<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> let them <S%H2490>pollute<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> any <S%H5750>more:<s%> and the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is <S%H935>come,<s%> and it is <S%H1961>done,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

And they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and shall set on <S%H1197>fire<s%> and <S%H5400>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons,<s%> both the <S%H4043>shields<s%> and the <S%H6793>bucklers,<s%> the <S%H7198>bows<s%> and the <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and the <S%H4731>handstaves,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> and they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> them with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> years: <S%H8141><s%>

So that they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> cut <S%H2404>down<s%> any out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3293>forests;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and they shall <S%H7997>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> those that <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> them, and <S%H962>rob<s%> <S%H853><s%> those that <S%H962>robbed<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H1463>Gog<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> of <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H2629>stop<s%> <S%H853><s%> the noses of the <S%H5674>passengers:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude:<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> it The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog.<s%>

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6912>burying<s%> of them, <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Yea, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> them; and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to them a <S%H8034>renown<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And they shall sever <S%H914>out<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of continual <S%H8548>employment,<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> <S%H853><s%> those that <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it: after the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall they <S%H2713>search.<s%>

And the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> that pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> when any <S%H7200>seeth<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6106>bone,<s%> then shall he set <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H6725>sign<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> it, <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H6912>buriers<s%> have <S%H6912>buried<s%> it <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog.<s%>
And <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1997>Hamonah.<s%> Thus shall they <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H559>Speak<s%> unto <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>feathered<s%> <S%H6833>fowl,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> Assemble <S%H6908>yourselves,<s%> and <S%H935>come;<s%> gather <S%H622>yourselves<s%> on every <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> for you, even a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that ye may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and of <S%H6260>goats,<s%> of <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> till ye be <S%H7654>full,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> till ye be <S%H7943>drunken,<s%> of my <S%H4480>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> for you.

Thus ye shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> with mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H7760>laid<s%> upon them.

So the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>forward.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, therefore <S%H5641>hid<s%> I my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> so <S%H5307>fell<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
According to their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> and according to their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them, and <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> will I bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%>

After that they have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4604>trespasses<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, when they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> made them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

When I have brought them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of their <S%H341>enemies'<s%> <S%H4480>lands,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and am <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> which caused them to be led into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> but I have <S%H3664>gathered<s%> them <S%H5921>unto<s%> their own <S%H127>land,<s%> and have <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> will I <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them: <S%H834>for<s%> I have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
